data.price: 5. Certes, avec la peine vient le soulagement;
6. Oui, avec la peine vient le soulagement.

dua.name: Dua for Protection from Anxiety
dua.significanceReason: Promises divine relief after difficulty, offering hope and comfort to those experiencing mental and emotional challenges.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.
